section.title: (fma) Features for release 0.1
section.para: We are aiming for the following features to be included in Eduras 0.1:

listitem.para: At least one seriously elaborate map.
Make items be able to respawn.
An easily configurable server including features like server-restart, -shut and -open, gamemode- and map-change and limitations on playercount.
A more complete HUD showing healthpoints, weapons and eventually score correctly.
A very simple website where you can download Eduras from and which gives basic information about the game and its current and future features.

para.emphasis: Support for EdurasViewer for Android and iOS.
